judges: Before Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The order of the Court of Common Pleas of Fayette County is affirmed.
Mr. Chief Justice Jones took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Paul Danko, Jr., appellant, in propria persona.
casebody.head_matter:
Danko, Appellant, v. Lincoln.
Argued September 25,1972.
Before Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
Paul Danko, Jr., appellant, in propria persona.
David D. Cohen, for appellee.
October 4, 1972:
